sentences.sContent: However, the collation would be wrong when the number of digits changed, so leading zeroes are provided.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, the collation would be wrong when the number of digits changed, so leading zeroes are provided.
sentences.sCn: 不过，如果数字的位数发生了变化，整理就会发生错误， 所以要给出前导的零。

sentences.sContent: CHAR Stores single-byte or multibyte text strings of fixed length (up to 32,767 bytes); supports code-set order in collation of text data.
sentences.sContent_eng: CHAR Stores single-byte or multibyte text strings of fixed length (up to 32,767 bytes); supports code-set order in collation of text data.
sentences.sCn: CHAR 存储固定长度的单字节或多字节的文本字符串（最高可达 32,767 个字节）；在整理文本数据时支持使用代码集顺序。

synos.tran: 校对；斋日的点心；牧师职务

trans.tranOther: the act or process of collating
